  2. Ave Maria Grotto

Ave Maria Grotto

Address: 1600 St Bernard Dr SE Location: Cullman, Alabama 35055

About This Attraction

Features 125 miniature reproductions of famous religious structures and buildings, crafted over decades by a monk.
